casebody.data:
Norman LEWIS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 21, 2016.

Ronald G. Weller, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

John C. Drapp III, assigned counsel, Bridgeport, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Norman Lewis' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 411, 139 A.3d 759 (2016), is denied.
